description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avoid the hazards as you race three other players (human or AI) to collecting the most elements.  Can you avoid getting trapped while trying to trap your opponents?  Or will you just go for the elements and ignore your opponents, the choice is yours in Element...  Another release from LoneWolf Studios
